Text:
actually just watching it fully and looks like
the audio is just a weebit out of sync
maybe nost havent noticed?

+100ms in vlc seems to adjust it enough

you can fix this in avidemux.org in like 1 min
if want too.. tick time on the side and enter 100
then go file pulll save video.. and enter a name
1 min.,, its done.

it pays to learn this tool comes in very handy
and some intro to video editing and conversions

beta 2.6 is much better it actually works with mp4s
and dont crash on loading them kiek the alpha build!
